Based on your preferences for a police procedural with eerie soundscapes, I would recommend "The Life Before Her Eyes." Directed by Michael Catonimo and based on a novel by Marita Gracey, this movie tells the story of a woman who wakes up in a hospital bed with no memory of how she ended up there. As the movie unfolds, we learn that the woman was involved in a dangerous and deadly game of cat and mouse, and as a result of her involvement in this dangerous game, she ends up waking up in a hospital bed with no memory of how she ended up there.
The other movie I would recommend is "The Skull." Directed by George Coulouris, Peter Cushing, Michael Gough, Christopher Lee, and starring these talented actors, this movie tells the story of a mysterious skull that has been found at various locations throughout history. As the movie unfolds, we learn that the skull is said to have magical powers and it is believed that whoever posses the skull will be able to achieve their dreams and desires.
I hope you find these recommendations helpful and enjoyable to watch.
